title: Warren Sharp on analytics, best future bets for 2018 (Football 07/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Warren Sharp of Sharp Football and the Warren Sharp Football Preview to break down the upcoming season from an analytical perspective. The guys discuss what sort of mistakes teams often make, how strength of schedule analysis can be improved, what the Falcons can do in order to keep their offense operating at a high level, how the Cowboys can overcome their lack of WR talent, what we should expect from sophomore QBs and which teams are the best bets to hit overs for the 2018 season.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
